verses.verse: And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to Bochim <S%H1066><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, I made you to go up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and have brought <S%H935><s%> you unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and I said <S%H559><s%>, I will never <S%H5769><s%> break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant with you <S%H1285><s%>:

and ye shall make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land <S%H776><s%>; ye shall break down <S%H5422><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>. But ye have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>: why have ye done this <S%H6213><s%>?

Wherefore I also said <S%H559><s%>, I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6654><s%>; but they shall be as thorns in your sides, and their gods <S%H430><s%> shall be a snare unto you <S%H4170><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4397><s%>, when the angel of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%>.
And they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Bochim <S%H1066><s%>: and they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> there unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Now when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had sent the people <S%H5971><s%> away <S%H7971><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> that outlived <S%H3117><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, who had seen <S%H7200><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that he had wrought <S%H6213><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%>, being a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>.

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnath-heres <S%H8556><s%>, in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, on the north of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Gaash <S%H1608><s%>.

And also all that generation <S%H1755><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>: and there arose <S%H6965><s%> another <S%H312><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>, that knew not Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, nor yet the work <S%H4639><s%> which he had wrought <S%H6213><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> the Baalim <S%H1168><s%>;

and they forsook <S%H5800><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, who brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and followed <S%H3212><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H7812><s%>, and bowed themselves down unto them <S%H3068><s%>: and they provoked Jehovah to anger <S%H3707><s%>.
And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> and the Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of spoilers <S%H8154><s%> that despoiled <S%H8155><s%> them <S%H4376><s%>; and he sold them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not any longer <S%H5750><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>.

Whithersoever they went out <S%H3318><s%>, the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was against them for evil <S%H7451><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%>, and as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them <S%H3966><s%>: and they were sore distressed <S%H3334><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> raised up <S%H6965><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%>, who saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that despoiled them <S%H8154><s%>.

And yet they hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto their judges <S%H8199><s%>; for they played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> themselves down unto them <S%H5493><s%>: they turned aside quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein their fathers <S%H1><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%>, obeying <S%H8085><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; but they did not so <S%H6213><s%>.

And when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> them up judges <S%H8199><s%>, then Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with the judge <S%H8199><s%>, and saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judge <S%H8199><s%>: for it repented <S%H5162><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of their groaning <S%H5009><s%> by reason of them that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them and vexed them <S%H1766><s%>.

But it came to pass <S%H8199><s%>, when the judge was dead <S%H4194><s%>, that they turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7843><s%>, and dealt more corruptly than their fathers <S%H1><s%>, in following <S%H3212><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H7812><s%>, and to bow down unto them <S%H5307><s%>; they ceased not from their doings <S%H4611><s%>, nor from their stubborn <S%H7186><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, Because this nation <S%H1471><s%> have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>, and have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>;

I also will not henceforth <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> when he died <S%H4191><s%>;

that by them I may prove <S%H5254><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whether they will keep <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> therein <S%H1><s%>, as their fathers did keep it <S%H8104><s%>, or not.

So Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H3240><s%> those nations <S%H1471><s%>, without <S%H1115><s%> driving them out <S%H3423><s%> hastily <S%H4118><s%>; neither delivered <S%H5414><s%> he them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>.
